list.title: AppSettingForm
list.description:
INTERNAL CODE DOCUMENTATION COMPLETE

App Setting Form Controller

A Stimulus controller that manages application settings forms with controlled submission and button state management. Provides form validation workflow control and submit button management for administrative configuration interfaces.

Key Features:

  • Controlled form submission with event prevention
  • Submit button state management and focus control
  • Form validation integration support
  • Administrative settings workflow management
  • Bootstrap form integration patterns

list.title: AppSettingForm#enableSubmit
list.description: Enable submit button and set focus Called when form validation passes or content changes Provides immediate user feedback for form readiness

list.title: AppSettingForm#submit
list.description: Handle form submission with event prevention Prevents default form submission behavior and manually triggers form submit Allows for additional validation or processing before submission

list.title: AppSettingModalController#connect
list.description: Connect - set up event listeners

list.title: AppSettingModalController#disconnect
list.description: Disconnect - clean up event listeners

list.title: AppSettingModalController#frameElement
list.description: Get the frame element by ID Uses direct DOM query since frame is outside controller scope

list.title: AppSettingModalController#handleOutletClick
list.description: Handle outlet button click event Loads the edit form for the clicked setting

list.title: AppSettingModalController#initialize
list.description: Initialize controller

list.title: AppSettingModalController#loadEditForm
list.description: Load the edit form into the turbo-frame

list.title: AppSettingModalController#modalElement
list.description: Get the modal element by ID Uses direct DOM query since modal is outside controller scope

list.title: AutoComplete
list.description:
INTERNAL CODE DOCUMENTATION COMPLETE

Auto Complete Controller

A comprehensive Stimulus controller providing advanced autocomplete functionality with AJAX search capabilities, keyboard navigation, and flexible value management. Supports remote data loading, local filtering, custom value support, and accessibility features.

Key Features:

  • Remote AJAX data loading with configurable endpoints
  • Local data filtering from pre-loaded datalists
  • Keyboard navigation (arrow keys, enter, escape)
  • Custom value support for "allow other" scenarios
  • Hidden field integration for form submission
  • Debounced search with configurable delay
  • Accessibility support with ARIA attributes
  • Clear button functionality with state management
  • Real-time validation and selection feedback
  • Bootstrap styling integration

list.title: DelayForwardController
list.description:
INTERNAL CODE DOCUMENTATION COMPLETE

Delayed Forward Controller

A Stimulus controller that provides automatic page redirection after a configurable delay. Useful for implementing splash screens, automatic redirects after form submissions, or timed navigation scenarios with user feedback periods.

Key Features:

  • Configurable delay timing for redirect control
  • Automatic cleanup to prevent memory leaks
  • Timeout management with proper cancellation
  • Immediate activation on controller connection
  • Console logging for debugging redirect behavior

list.title: DelayForwardController#connect
list.description: Initialize controller and start delayed forward process Automatically begins the redirect timer upon connection

list.title: DelayForwardController#disconnect
list.description: Clean up timeout on controller disconnection Prevents redirect execution if controller is disconnected before timeout completes Essential for preventing memory leaks and unwanted redirects

list.title: DelayForwardController#forward
list.description: Manage delayed redirect with timeout control Cancels any existing timeout before setting a new one to prevent multiple redirects Uses window.location.href for full page navigation

list.title: DelayForwardController#timeout
list.description: Timer reference for cleanup management

list.title: GWSharingController#submit
list.description:
Submit Form Automatically

Triggers immediate form submission when GW sharing toggle switches are changed, providing instant persistence of user preferences.

Automatic Submission:

  • Called by toggle switch change events
  • Submits form using standard browser mechanisms
  • Preserves all form data and validation
  • Maintains CSRF protection and security measures

User Experience: Eliminates need for manual save actions by automatically persisting toggle changes when users interact with switches, providing immediate feedback and seamless preference management.

Form Integration: Uses browser-native form submission to maintain compatibility with existing server-side validation, error handling, and security measures without additional AJAX complexity.

list.title: KMP_Timezone
list.description:
KMP Timezone Utilities

Client-side timezone handling for the KMP application. Provides utilities for detecting user timezone, formatting dates/times, and converting between timezones for datetime inputs and displays.

See /docs/10.3.1-timezone-utils-api.md for complete API documentation and usage examples.

list.title: KMP_Timezone.convertFormDatetimesToUTC
list.description: Convert all datetime-local inputs to UTC before form submission Creates hidden inputs with UTC values, disables originals

list.title: KMP_Timezone.detectTimezone
list.description: Detect user's timezone from browser using Intl.DateTimeFormat

list.title: KMP_Timezone.formatDate
list.description: Format date only (no time)

list.title: KMP_Timezone.formatDateTime
list.description: Convert UTC datetime to user's timezone for display

list.title: KMP_Timezone.formatTime
list.description: Format time only (no date)

list.title: KMP_Timezone.getAbbreviation
list.description: Get timezone abbreviation (e.g., CDT, EST, PST)

list.title: KMP_Timezone.getTimezone
list.description: Get timezone from element data attribute or detect from browser

list.title: KMP_Timezone.getTimezoneOffset
list.description: Get timezone offset in minutes for a specific timezone and date

list.title: KMP_Timezone.initializeDatetimeInputs
list.description: Initialize timezone conversion for all datetime inputs on page Finds inputs with data-utc-value and converts to local time

list.title: KMP_Timezone.toLocalInput
list.description: Convert UTC datetime to HTML5 datetime-local format in user's timezone

list.title: KMP_Timezone.toUTC
list.description: Convert datetime-local input value (local time) to UTC for storage

list.title: PermissionAddRole
list.description:
INTERNAL CODE DOCUMENTATION COMPLETE

Permission Add Role Controller

A specialized Stimulus controller for managing role assignments to permissions with real-time validation and submit control. Provides seamless role selection validation for RBAC permission configuration workflows.

Key Features:

  • Role ID validation from autocomplete selection
  • Real-time form validation with submit control
  • Focus management for improved user experience
  • ID parsing from underscore-separated values
  • Integration with autocomplete role selection
  • Bootstrap form integration with disabled state management

list.title: PermissionAddRole#checkSubmitEnable
list.description: Validate role selection and control submit button state Parses role ID from underscore-separated value format Enables submission only when valid role is selected Provides focus management for improved user workflow

list.title: PermissionManagePolicies
list.description:
INTERNAL CODE DOCUMENTATION COMPLETE

Permission Manage Policies Controller

A sophisticated Stimulus controller that provides an interactive permission matrix for managing CakePHP authorization policies. Features hierarchical checkbox management with indeterminate states, batch processing for performance, and asynchronous AJAX updates with queue management.

Key Features:

  • Hierarchical checkbox management (class-level controls method-level checkboxes)
  • Indeterminate state indicators for partial selections
  • Batch processing with loading overlay for performance optimization
  • Asynchronous AJAX queue management for reliable server updates
  • Dynamic event listener management with cleanup

list.title: PermissionManagePolicies#changeMethod
list.description: Queue permission change for server update Adds change to queue and processes if not already processing

list.title: PermissionManagePolicies#changeQueue
list.description: Queue for managing sequential AJAX requests to prevent race conditions

list.title: PermissionManagePolicies#checkClass
list.description: Update class-level checkbox state based on method selections Implements three-state logic: checked, unchecked, and indeterminate

list.title: PermissionManagePolicies#classClicked
list.description: Handle class-level checkbox clicks Updates all method-level checkboxes and manages indeterminate state

list.title: PermissionManagePolicies#connect
list.description: Controller initialization and setup Implements batch processing for performance optimization when dealing with large permission matrices. Shows loading overlay during processing.

list.title: PermissionManagePolicies#disconnect
list.description: Clean up event listeners on controller disconnect Removes all dynamically added event listeners to prevent memory leaks

list.title: PermissionManagePolicies#hideLoadingOverlay
list.description: Remove loading overlay after processing completion Cleans up spinner overlay from permissions matrix

list.title: PermissionManagePolicies#methodClicked
list.description: Handle method-level checkbox clicks Updates parent class checkbox state and queues server update

list.title: PermissionManagePolicies#policyClassTargetConnected
list.description: Event handler for policy class target connection Sets up click event listeners for class-level checkboxes

list.title: PermissionManagePolicies#policyMethodTargetConnected
list.description: Event handler for policy method target connection Sets up click event listeners for method-level checkboxes

list.title: PermissionManagePolicies#processQueue
list.description: Process queued permission changes sequentially Handles AJAX communication with server for policy updates Maintains queue integrity and prevents race conditions

list.title: PermissionManagePolicies#showLoadingOverlay
list.description: Display loading overlay during batch processing Creates a Bootstrap spinner overlay for performance indication

Revoke Form Controller

A specialized Stimulus controller that manages revocation workflows with outlet communication and form validation. Provides seamless integration between trigger elements and revocation forms with real-time validation and submit control.

Key Features:

  • Inter-controller communication through outlet pattern
  • Dynamic ID management from external triggers
  • Real-time form validation with submit control
  • Automatic event listener management and cleanup
  • Bootstrap form integration with disabled state management

Role Add Member Controller

A specialized Stimulus controller for managing role membership assignments with member validation and optional branch requirements. Provides real-time form validation and submit control for RBAC member assignment workflows.

  • Member ID validation from autocomplete selection
  • Optional branch requirement validation
  • Real-time form validation with submit control
  • Focus management for improved user experience
  • Integration with autocomplete member selection
  • Bootstrap form integration with disabled state management

list.title: SelectAllListController
list.description:
INTERNAL CODE DOCUMENTATION COMPLETE

Select All Switch List Controller

A sophisticated Stimulus controller that provides automatic "Select All" functionality for Bootstrap form-switch checkbox lists. Creates and manages a master checkbox that controls all individual checkboxes with bidirectional synchronization.

Key Features:

  • Automatic "Select All" header checkbox generation
  • Bidirectional synchronization between master and individual checkboxes
  • Bootstrap form-switch styling consistency
  • Dynamic checkbox discovery and event management
  • Accessibility support with ARIA labels
  • Automatic state management for partial selections
